tooltip: Use this block to match to an object or data value.

Use to give the variable in the first input the value in the right input.
All the statements listed are true with regard to the same variables. Usually required only inside an "or" block. See help for more information.
Use to check whether any of the contained statements is true. To combine statements, use an "all of" inside this block.
Use to match if the statements are known false. Usually, you will want to use the "not" block. See help for details.
Use to match if the statements are not known to be true.
